name: Febry's Tank V-Day (Victory Day)
description:
Nama Games : Febry's Tank

Version : 1.0

Category : Game 2D

Genre : War, Battle, Casual

Description

The only Tank Man Soldier left on the battlefield is Febry Mahendra Pratama who tried to survive the enemy army tank attack before finally gained Victory Day 1944.

Controls

Mechanic (Move Forward and Backward) W S

Mechanic (Rotation Move) A D

Mechanic (Space Bar for shooting)

I really hope you will enjoy this short game and would love to hear any kind of feedback!
